definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="79" y="157"><field name="trigger">No additional trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">AND</field><comment pinned="false" h="86" w="405">This tests if the item is the same as what is being crafted and if the stack amount is equal to or less than 63. This item should be the crafted item. Note that +1 is the amount you are crafting.</comment><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:Bb</field></block></value><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Звуки принтера</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
